# Tao Creative Labs

> Tao Creative Labs is an applied artificial intelligence company and venture studio. We build consumer AI applications, automation systems, and provide AI consulting for businesses.

## About

Tao Creative Labs LLC is an AI venture studio focused on practical, applied artificial intelligence. We design, build, and operate intelligent software â€” from consumer applications to enterprise automation systems. Founded on the principle that AI should be practical, private, and accessible.

## Contact

- Website: https://taocreativelabs.com
- Email: hello@taocreativelabs.com
- Contact form: https://taocreativelabs.com/contact

## Products

- [ReelChef](https://www.reelchef.app/): AI cooking assistant that converts social media food videos into structured recipes and meal plans.
- [Aura](https://www.wearaura.app/): AI virtual try-on and wardrobe assistant that helps users visualize outfits and clothing.
- [LucidDreamz](https://www.luciddreamz.app/): AI character roleplay and conversational storytelling platform.
- [Notica](https://www.getnotica.com/): Offline-first private AI notes and local LLM workspace.
- [PocketManga](https://www.pocketmanga.app/): AI manga and comic creation platform.
- [Fortaify](https://fortaify.com/): The infrastructure and parent platform powering Tao Creative Labs applications.

## Services

- AI Automation: Workflow automation, agents, integrations, and internal copilots.
- AI Consulting: Strategy, implementation roadmaps, and custom model deployments.
- AI Products: Consumer AI applications designed and operated for everyday users.

## Business Solutions

- AI workflow automation
- Document processing and extraction
- Enterprise knowledge bases
- Custom chatbots and conversational AI
- Local private AI deployments
- Custom internal copilots
